name: Roasted Tomatoes
keywords: side dish, summer, tomato, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 8 large ripe tomatoes, cut in half horizontally
Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
3 tablespoons fresh Italian parsley or basil, snipped with scissors

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Place the tomatoes on a baking sheet, cut-side up. Sprinkle with the olive oil and add salt and pepper to taste.

Bake for two to three hours, or until tomatoes begin to collapse and caramelize. Sprinkle with garlic halfway through the cooking time or at the very end, and add either the parsley or the basil before serving. Serve the tomatoes hot or at room temperature.
